name: Blink Dagger

body: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.
Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

notes: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

name: Blades of Attack
lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

name: Broadsword
lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

name: Chainmail
lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

name: Claymore
lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

name: Helm of Iron Will
lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

name: Javelin

body: Grants each attack a 30% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.

lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

name: Mithril Hammer
lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

name: Platemail
lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

name: Quarterstaff
lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

name: Quelling Blade

body: Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targeting wards.
Tree Range: 350Ward Range: cast_range_ward
Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 12 for melee heroes, and 6 for ranged.

notes: Effects of multiple quelling blades do not stack.
Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Remote Mines.
lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

name: Ring of Protection
lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

name: Gauntlets of Strength
lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

name: Slippers of Agility
lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

name: Mantle of Intelligence
lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

name: Iron Branch

body: Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.
Range: range_tooltip

lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

name: Belt of Strength
lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

name: Band of Elvenskin
lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

name: Robe of the Magi
lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

name: Circlet
lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

name: Ogre Axe
lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

name: Blade of Alacrity
lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

name: Staff of Wizardry
lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

name: Ultimate Orb
lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

name: Gloves of Haste
lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

name: Morbid Mask

body: Heals the attacker for 15% of attack damage dealt.

lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

name: Ring of Regen
notes: Ring of Regen is shareable.
lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

name: Sage's Mask
notes: Sage's Mask is shareable.
lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

name: Boots of Speed

body: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

name: Gem of True Sight

body: Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 900 range of its carrier.
Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

notes: Disabled while on a courier.
lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

name: Cloak
notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

name: Talisman of Evasion
notes: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

name: Cheese

body: Instantly restores 2500 health and 1500 mana.

notes: Cheese is shareable.
lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.

name: Magic Stick

body: Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored.
Max 10 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

notes: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

name: Magic Wand

body: Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored.
Max 20 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

notes: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

name: Ghost Scepter

body: You enter ghost form for 4 seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage.

notes: Ends if you become Spell Immune, and will have no effect if you are already Spell Immune.
Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.
lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

name: Clarity

body: Grants 6 mana regeneration to the target for 25 seconds.
If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.
Range: range_tooltip

lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

name: Healing Salve

body: Grants 40 health regeneration to the target for 10 seconds.
If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.
Range: tooltip_range

lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

name: Dust of Appearance

body: Reveals and slows invisible heroes by -20% in a 1050 radius around the caster for 12 seconds.

notes: Places a debuff on enemy units in the area that reveals them when they are invisible.
lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.

name: Bottle

body: Consumes a charge to restore 110 health and 60 mana over 2.7 seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.
The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.
Hold Control to use on an allied hero.
Range: tooltip_range
Runes can be stored in the bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 2 minutes.
Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle. Stored Bounty Runes replenish 2/3 charges.

notes: Bottle is shareable. Stored runes cannot be shared.
If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier, the courier's movespeed will be slowed by 30%.
lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

name: Observer Ward

body: Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a vision_range radius to your team. Lasts 6 minutes.
Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.
Range: tooltip_range

lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

name: Sentry Ward

body: Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a 900 radius.
Lasts 7 minutes.
Does not grant ground vision.
Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.
Range: tooltip_range

lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

name: Tango

body: Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming a ward or Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.
Comes with 3 charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.
Range: tooltip_range
Ward Range: cast_range_ward

lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

name: Animal Courier

body: Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.

lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

name: Town Portal Scroll

body: After channeling for 3 seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building.
Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

notes: If multiple heroes teleport to the same location in succession, the channeling time will be increased for each successive hero.
lore: What a hero truly needs.

name: Boots of Travel (level 1)

body: Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Teleporting to a unit is interrupted if the target unit dies.
Shares a cooldown with Town Portal Scroll.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

name: Phase Boots

body: Gives 20% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 10% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for 3 seconds.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

name: Demon Edge
lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

name: Eaglesong
lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

name: Reaver
lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

name: Sacred Relic
lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

name: Hyperstone
lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

name: Ring of Health
notes: Ring of Health is shareable.
lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

name: Void Stone
notes: Void Stone is shareable.
lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

name: Mystic Staff
lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

name: Energy Booster
lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

name: Point Booster
lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

name: Vitality Booster
lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

name: Power Treads

body: Switches between +10 Strength, +10 Agility, or +10 Intelligence.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

notes: Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi.
The attack speed bonus from multiple Power Treads does not stack.
lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

name: Hand of Midas

body: Kills a non-hero target for 160 gold and 2.1x experience.
Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.
Range: transmute_cast_range_tooltip

notes: The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).
Experience gained by using Transmute is not shared.
lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

name: Oblivion Staff
lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

name: Perseverance
notes: Perseverance is shareable.
lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

name: Poor Man's Shield

body: When cooldown is ready, blocks bonus_block_melee damage on melee heroes and bonus_block_range on ranged heroes. Only triggers on attacks from heroes.
Gives a 50% chance to block 30 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 20 damage on ranged.

notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.

name: Bracer
lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

name: Wraith Band
lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

name: Null Talisman
lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

name: Mekansm

body: Heals 275 health and gives +heal_bonus_armor armor to allied units in a 1200 radius.
Grants 2.5 health regeneration to allied units in a 1200 radius.

notes: Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore in the last 25 seconds.
Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

name: Vladmir's Offering

body: Grants lifesteal (vampiric_aura% for melee heroes, vampiric_aura_ranged% for ranged), hp_regen health regeneration, 1.75 mana regeneration, 18% bonus attack damage, and 3 armor to nearby allies.
Radius: 1200

notes: Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

name: Buckler

body: Gives +2 armor to all allied units. Lasts bonus_aoe_duration_hero seconds on heroes, bonus_aoe_duration seconds on units.
Radius: 1200

lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

name: Ring of Basilius

body: Grants 1 mana regeneration and aura_bonus_armor armor in a 1200 radius.
Deactivate aura to stop affecting non-hero units.

notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius or Ring of Aquila.
Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.
lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

name: Pipe of Insight

body: Gives a shield that blocks 400 magic damage to all nearby allies. Lasts 12 seconds.
Radius: 1200
Gives allied units 2.5 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance.
Radius: 1200

notes: Multiple instances of Barrier do not stack.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance.
lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

name: Urn of Shadows

body: Provides 30 health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals 25 damage per second when cast on enemies.
Lasts 8 seconds.
Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.
Cast Range: soul_release_range_tooltip

notes: Empty urns gain 2 charges.
If used on a hero with Soul Release already active on them, it will refresh its duration.
lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

name: Headdress

body: Grants 2 health regeneration to allies.
Radius: 1200

notes: Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.
lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

name: Scythe of Vyse

body: Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.
Instantly destroys illusions.
Range: tooltip_range

notes: The target will have a base movement speed of 140, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

name: Orchid Malevolence

body: Silences the target unit for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, 30% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.
Range: tooltip_range

lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

name: Eul's Scepter of Divinity

body: Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.
Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.
Range: cast_range_tooltip
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

notes: You cannot cyclone allies.
Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.
Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

name: Force Staff

body: Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.
Range: tooltip_range

notes: Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.
Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

name: Dagon (level 1)

body: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.
Range: range_tooltip

notes: Instantly kills illusions.
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: Necronomicon (level 1)

description.type:
active: demonic summoningsummons a warrior and an archer to fight for you for 60 seconds.

warrior:

burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. gains true sight at level 3.
health: 800,1200,1600
damage: 25,45,65
mana break damage: 30,40,50
last will damage: 600,700,800

archer
body: Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.
Damage: 37,57,75
Aura Move Speed: 5,7,9
Aura Attack Speed: archer_attack_speed
Aura Radius: 1200

lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

name: Aghanim's Scepter

body: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of certain heroes.

lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

name: Refresher Orb

body: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

name: Assault Cuirass

body: Grants 30 attack speed and 5 armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by -5.
Radius: 1200

notes: Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

name: Heart of Tarrasque

body: Restores health_regen_rate% of max health per second.
If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for cooldown_melee seconds for melee heroes, or cooldown_ranged_tooltip seconds for ranged heroes.

lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

name: Black King Bar

body: Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance. Duration decreases with each use.
Duration: 9,8,7,6
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

notes: Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.
Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

name: Aegis of the Immortal

body: Brings you to life with full health and mana 5 seconds after you die, at the location where you died.
Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).

notes: Pronounced as ayy jis.
lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

name: Shiva's Guard

body: Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4 seconds.
Radius: 900
Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by -45.
Radius: 1200

notes: The wave extends at a speed of 350 to a max size of 900.
The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

name: Bloodstone

body: Instantly causes you to die.
Must ground target to cast. Cannot self cast.
Begins with tooltip_charges charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1600 range.
Each charge grants mana_per_charge mana regeneration per second, and reduces respawn time by respawn_time_reduction seconds.
If the bearer dies, the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges.

notes: Only the first Bloodstone will gain charges.
lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

name: Linken's Sphere

body: Blocks most targeted spells once every 12 seconds.
Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for 12 seconds.
Range: cast_range_tooltip

lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

name: Vanguard

body: Grants a 60% chance to block 64 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 32 damage on ranged.

notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

name: Blade Mail

body: For 4.5 seconds, duplicates any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage.

notes: Damage Return is calculated before any kind of reduction.
Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other forms of Blade Mail.
Returned damage type is the same as it was received.
Can pierce Spell Immunity if the original damage type does.
lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

name: Soul Booster
lore: Regain lost courage.

name: Hood of Defiance

body: Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 325 magical damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

name: Divine Rapier

body: Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.

notes: If Divine Rapier is dropped and picked up by an enemy of its original owner, it cannot be dropped again except by death.
lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

name: Monkey King Bar

body: Grants each attack a 80% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.

lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

name: Radiance

body: When active, scorches enemies for 60 magical damage per second, and causes them to miss 17% of their attacks. Illusions deal 35 magical damage per second.
Radius: 700

lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

name: Butterfly

body: Grants bonus_move_speed% additional movement speed for duration seconds.

notes: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

name: Daedalus

body: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 225% damage.

notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

name: Skull Basher

body: Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.5 seconds and deal 100 bonus magical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

notes: Does not stack with other sources of Bash, however it will stack with Mini-Bash.
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Troll Warlord.
lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

name: Battle Fury

body: Destroy a target tree or ward.
Tree Cast Range: cast_range_tooltip
Ward Cast Range: cast_range_ward
Increases attack damage against non-hero units by tooltip_quelling_bonus% for melee heroes, and tooltip_quelling_bonus_ranged% for ranged.
Deals 70% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to 650 around the target. (Melee Only)

notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
If multiple sources of Cleave are present, each Cleave's damage is applied separately.
Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Remote Mines.
lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

name: Manta Style

body: Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds.
Melee images deal 33% damage and take tooltip_damage_incoming_melee_total_pct% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take tooltip_damage_incoming_ranged_total_pct% damage.
Cooldown increased by tooltip_ranged_cooldown_increase seconds on ranged heroes.
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

notes: Has a 0.1 second cast time during which you are invulnerable.
Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
Yasha based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

name: Crystalys

body: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 160% damage.

notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

name: Armlet of Mordiggian

body: When active, Unholy Strength grants +35 damage, +25 strength and +4 armor, but drains unholy_health_drain_per_second_tooltip health per second.
You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.

notes: The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change.
The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds.
Activating or deactivating Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling.
lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

name: Shadow Blade

body: Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units.
If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus physical damage on that attack.

notes: Has a 0.3 second fade time.
If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.
lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

name: Sange and Yasha

body: Each attack has a maim_chance% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by maim_slow_movement% and attack speed by maim_slow_attack when used by a melee hero. Reduces enemy hero movement by maim_slow_movement_range% and attack speed by maim_slow_attack_range when used by a ranged hero. Effect lasts maim_duration seconds.

notes: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

name: Satanic

body: Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 6 seconds.
Heals the attacker for 25% of attack damage dealt.

lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

name: Mjollnir

body: Places a charged shield on a target unit for 15 seconds which has a 20% chance to release a 225 magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.
Range: tooltip_range
Grants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 12 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 180 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

notes: Static Charge cannot trigger more than once per second.
Static Charge's shock deals magical damage centered on hero with the Static Charge. Static Charge's targets cannot be more than 900 range away.
Static Charge procs will not bounce to heroes that are invisible or hidden by Fog of War.
lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

name: Eye of Skadi

body: Attacks lower enemy attack speed by cold_attack_speed and movement speed by cold_movement_speed%.
Lasts cold_duration_melee seconds when used by melee heroes, and cold_duration_ranged seconds when used by ranged.

notes: Lasts 5 seconds with melee Eye of Skadi, 2.5 seconds with ranged Eye of Skadi.
lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

name: Sange

body: Each attack has a maim_chance% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by maim_slow_movement% and attack speed by maim_slow_attack when used by a melee hero. Reduces enemy hero movement by maim_slow_movement_range% and attack speed by maim_slow_attack_range when used by a ranged hero. Effect lasts maim_duration seconds.

lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

name: Helm of the Dominator (level 1)

body: Takes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 380 and max health to a minimum of 1000.
Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1000 retain their original max health. Dominated unit's bounty is set to tooltip_bounty gold.
Range: tooltip_range
Increases nearby allies' attack speed by attack_speed_aura and health regen by hp_regen_aura.
Radius: aura_radius

notes: Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time.  If a new unit is dominated, the old one will die.
Can also Dominate enemy lane creeps and summoned units.
Selling Helm of the Dominator will cause dominated units to die.
lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

name: Maelstrom

body: Grants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 140 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

name: Desolator

body: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -6 for 7 seconds.

notes: Armor reduction works on buildings.
lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

name: Yasha
notes: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

name: Mask of Madness

body: Gives 110 attack speed and 30% movement speed, but reduces your armor by 8 and silences you. Lasts 6 seconds.
Heals the attacker for 20% of attack damage dealt.

lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

name: Diffusal Blade

body: Targets an enemy, slowing it for 4 seconds.
Range: cast_range_tooltip
Each attack burns 40 mana from the target, and deals 1 physical damage per burned mana.
Burns 12 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions.

notes: Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.
lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

name: Ethereal Blade

body: Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage. Lasts for 4 seconds on allies and 4 seconds on enemies.
Enemy targets are also slowed by -80%, and take 1.5x your primary attribute + 125 as magical damage.
Range: tooltip_range

notes: Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter.
Ethereal units take 40% bonus magic damage.
Lasts an extra second on Self or Allied cast.
Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.
lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

name: Soul Ring

body: Consume 170 health to temporarily gain 150 mana. Lasts 10 seconds.
If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.

notes: If this mana is not used before the duration ends, the extra mana is lost.
lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

name: Arcane Boots

body: Restores 175 mana to all nearby allies.
Radius: 1200
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

notes: Does not work on Meepo clones.
lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

name: Orb of Venom

body: Poisons the target, dealing 2 magical damage per second and slowing movement by -13% if the equipped hero is melee, or 2 magical damage per second and slowing movement by -4% if they are ranged. Lasts for 2 seconds.

lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

name: Stout Shield

body: Grants a 50% chance to block 20 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 8 damage on ranged.

notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.

name: Drum of Endurance

body: Gives +45 attack speed and +13% movement speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds.
Radius: 1200
Gives bonus_aura_movement_speed movement speed to nearby allies.
Radius: 1200

notes: Re-purchasing the Drum of Endurance recipe will refresh its charges.
Multiple instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack.
lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

name: Medallion of Courage

body: If cast on an ally, grants them the 5 armor, and removing it from the caster.
If cast on an enemy, reduces 5 armor on both the enemy and the caster.
Cannot target magic immune enemies.
Range: valor_cast_range_tooltip

lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

name: Smoke of Deceit

body: Turns the caster and all allied player-controlled units in a 1200 radius invisible, and grants 15% bonus movement speed for 35 seconds.
Attacking, or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility.
Disguise grants invisibility that is immune to True Sight.

lore: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

name: Veil of Discord

body: Cast a 600 radius blast that decreases enemy magic resistance by resist_debuff%.
Range: tooltip_range
Duration: 16 seconds.

lore: The headwear of corrupt magi.

name: Necronomicon (level 2)

description.type:
active: demonic summoningsummons a warrior and an archer to fight for you for 60 seconds.

warrior:

burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. gains true sight at level 3.
health: 800,1200,1600
damage: 25,45,65
mana break damage: 30,40,50
last will damage: 600,700,800

archer
body: Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.
Damage: 37,57,75
Aura Move Speed: 5,7,9
Aura Attack Speed: archer_attack_speed
Aura Radius: 1200

lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

name: Necronomicon (level 3)

description.type:
active: demonic summoningsummons a warrior and an archer to fight for you for 60 seconds.

warrior:

burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. gains true sight at level 3.
health: 800,1200,1600
damage: 25,45,65
mana break damage: 30,40,50
last will damage: 600,700,800

archer
body: Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.
Damage: 37,57,75
Aura Move Speed: 5,7,9
Aura Attack Speed: archer_attack_speed
Aura Radius: 1200

lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

name: Dagon (level 2)

body: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.
Range: range_tooltip

notes: Instantly kills illusions.
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: Dagon (level 3)

body: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.
Range: range_tooltip

notes: Instantly kills illusions.
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: Dagon (level 4)

body: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.
Range: range_tooltip

notes: Instantly kills illusions.
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: Dagon (level 5)

body: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.
Range: range_tooltip

notes: Instantly kills illusions.
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: Rod of Atos

body: Roots the target for 2 seconds.
Range: tooltip_range

lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

name: Abyssal Blade

body: Stuns a target enemy unit for 2 seconds.
Pierces Spell Immunity.
Range: tooltip_range
Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.5 seconds and deal 120 bonus magical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.
Grants a 60% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

notes: The stun is melee range.
Does not stack with other bashes.
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Troll Warlord.
Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

name: Heaven's Halberd

body: Prevents a target from attacking for 3 seconds on melee targets, and 5 seconds on ranged targets.
Range: disarm_cast_range_tooltip

Each attack has a maim_chance% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by maim_slow_movement% and attack speed by maim_slow_attack if the user is melee. Reduces enemy hero movement by maim_slow_movement_range% and attack speed by maim_slow_attack_range if the user is ranged. Effect lasts maim_duration seconds.

lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

name: Ring of Aquila

body: Grants 1.25 mana regeneration and 2 armor to nearby allies.
Radius: 1200
Deactivate to stop affecting non-hero units.

notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius or Ring of Aquila.
Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.
lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

name: Tranquil Boots

body: Whenever you attack or are attacked, the bonus 14 HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to 40 for 13 seconds.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

name: Shadow Amulet

body: Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero as long as the target unit remains still.
Has a 1.25 second fade time, and breaks instantly upon moving.
There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.
Range: tooltip_range

lore: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

name: Enchanted Mango

body: Instantly restores 100 mana.
Range: range_tooltip

notes: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.
lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

name: Observer and Sentry Wards

body: Plant the currently active ward. Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.
Range: tooltip_range

notes: Hold Control to give one ward to an allied hero.
lore: Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.

name: Boots of Travel (level 2)

body: Teleports you to any allied structure or unit, including heroes. Teleporting to a unit is interrupted if the target unit dies.
Shares a cooldown with Town Portal Scroll.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

body: CHANNELED - After a successful channel, summons a meteor that strikes a 315 AoE, stunning enemies for 1.5 seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage over time to enemies units and buildings for 6 seconds.Building Impact Damage: 75 Building Over Time Damage: 60 Non-Building Impact Damage: 150 Non-Building Over Time Damage: 90 Channel Duration: 2.5 seconds.Landing Time: 0.5 seconds.
Dispels the target and mutes them for 5 seconds. Anytime the muted target is attacked, it will be slowed by 80% for 0.5 seconds.
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

name: Lotus Orb

body: Applies a shield to the target unit for 6 seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster.
The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell.
Range: cast_range_tooltip
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

name: Solar Crest

body: When cast on an ally, grants them 6 armor and bonus_evasion% evasion. When cast on an enemy, removes 6 of their armor and grants your allies truestrike_chance% Accuracy on the target.
Removes the armor and evasion from the caster when used.
Cannot target magic immune enemies.
Range: valor_cast_range_tooltip

lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

name: Guardian Greaves

body: Restores 300 health and 200 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.
Radius: 1200
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Provides nearby allies with 2.5 health regeneration and 3 bonus armor. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 16 health regeneration and 10 armor.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

notes: The aura boost only applies to heroes.
lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

name: Aether Lens

body: Increases targeted spell and item cast range by 225.

notes: Passive does not stack.
lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

name: Octarine Core

body: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.
hero_lifesteal% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.
Lifesteal reduced to creep_lifesteal% against creeps.

lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

name: Dragon Lance

body: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.

notes: Passive does not stack.
lore: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.

name: Faerie Fire

body: Instantly restores 85 health.

lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

name: Iron Talon

body: Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove 40% of its current HP.
If cast on a tree or ward, instantly destroys it.
Unit Range: tooltip_range
Tree Range: 350Ward Range: 450
Increases attack damage against non-hero units by damage_bonus for melee heroes, and damage_bonus_ranged for ranged.

notes: Has a 4 second cooldown on Trees.
Cannot target ancients.
lore: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.

name: Blight Stone

body: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -2 for 8 seconds.

lore: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

name: Tango (Shared)

body: Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming a ward or Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.
Range: tooltip_range
Ward Range: cast_range_ward

lore: Om nom nom.

name: Crimson Guard

body: For 12 seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings +bonus_aoe_armor armor, and a 100% chance to block 70 damage from each incoming attack.
Units may only be affected by Guard once every 40 seconds.
Radius: 1200
Grants a 60% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

name: Wind Lace

body: Bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.

lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.

name: Moon Shard

body: Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed and 200 bonus night vision. Max 1 use.
Grants 400 bonus night vision.

notes: The bonus night vision works during Night Stalker's Darkness ability.
lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

name: Silver Edge

body: Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While invisible, you move 25% faster and can move through units.
Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 175 bonus physical damage to the target, and for 4 seconds, disable their passive abilities.

notes: Backstab cannot miss.
Backstab does not pierce spell immunity.
lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

name: Bloodthorn

body: Silences a target for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 30% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage.
All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and 100% chance to crit for 130% damage.
Range: tooltip_range
Grants a crit_chance% chance for attacks to inflict crit_multiplier% damage.

notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

name: Echo Sabre

body: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 100% movement slow for 0.8 seconds on each strike.

lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

name: Glimmer Cape

body: After a 0.6 second delay, grants invisibility and 45% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for 5 seconds.
Range: tooltip_range
Can be cast while channelling.

lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

body: When you take damage and your health falls below 70%, a strong dispel is applied and you gain a 2.5 second buff that causes all damage you deal and are dealt to be reduced to zero. Only triggers on player based damage.

name: Tome of Knowledge

body: Grants you 700 experience plus 135 per tome consumed by your team.
Tomes Used By Team: customval_team_tomes_used

lore: That which raises beast to man and man to god.

name: Refresher Shard

body: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

notes: Refresher Shard is shareable.

name: Hurricane Pike

body: Pushes you and target enemy 450 units away from each other, and for 6 seconds, allows you to make 5 attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +100 attack speed.
Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.
Allied Range: tooltip_range
Enemy Range: 400
Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.

notes: Self-cast will use Hurricane Pike on yourself.
Hurricane Pike doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

name: Infused Raindrops

body: Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 75 damage.
Comes with 6 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.

notes: Uses at most one charge per damage instance.
lore: Elemental protection from magical assaults.

body: When used against enemies, it reduces health by 4% of current health per second, and reduces HP regeneration and healing by 45%. Deals 35 damage per second.

When used on allies, it increases health by ally_hp_gain% of current health per second, and increases HP regeneration and healing by hp_regen_increase_allies%. Provides 40 health regeneration per second.
Lasts 8 seconds.
Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Spirit Vessel to the dying hero will gain a charge.
Cast Range: soul_release_range_tooltip

name: Flying Courier

body: Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base.
Requires a deployed Animal Courier.

lore: The faithful mount upon which soar the fortunes of battle.

body: Restores replenish_amount mana in an area.

Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into liquid chrome for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

Pour this serum into the river to dry up the water for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect . Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into a green slime for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

Pour this serum into the river to make the water oily for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

Pour this serum into the river to make the water electric for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into a purple bubbling potion for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into blood for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

name: Super Blink Dagger

body: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.

lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
